nCorrectors.title: nCorrectors
nCorrectors.description: sets the number of times the algorithm solves the pressure equation and momentum corrector in each step

nNonOrthogonalCorrectors.title: nNonOrthogonalCorrectors
nNonOrthogonalCorrectors.description: pecifies repeated solutions of the pressure equation, used to update the explicit non-orthogonal correction

momentumPredictor.title: momentumPredictor
momentumPredictor.description: switch that controls solving of the momentum predictor
